conversations.content: How much did I spend on shopping today?

<|Function_Thought|>
I will first get the current day so I can identify today's orders. Next I will retrieve the order history and filter orders whose order_date equals the current day. For those orders I will fetch their invoices to sum the total spent today. Next step: call get_current_day.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_current_day()]<|/Function_Call|>

<|Function_Thought|>
I received the current day: 2024-05-19. Next I will retrieve the account's order history so I can identify orders placed today (order_date == 2024-05-19). After getting the order history I'll filter for today's orders and then call get_invoice for each matching order to compute the total spent today.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[]<|/Function_Call|>
